sense.def:
None
pomeni niti ena oseba ali stvar ali niti najmanjša količina česa.

seg.quote: None of these suggestions is very helpful.
None of us were allowed to go.
I have answered every single question. My opponent has answered none.
‘You had no difficulty in finding it?’—‘None at all.’

sense.def:
Izraz
none too
uporabljamo v pomenu
not at all
;

seg.quote: We're none too sure what we're arguing about.
He hauled her none too gently to her feet.
